Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Diarect dial phone, Radio, Refrigerator, Safe. Tenis court. Conference room capacity: 280 persons.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: situated at the village of Vassilikos, right on the beach of Mavradzi, 15km from Zakynthos town, adjacent to its sister hotels Louis Royal Palace and Louis Palazzo di Zante. Nearest airport: 17km.
